dcterms:description: ScanNetV2 is a large-scale dataset containing RGB-D scans of indoor scenes with rich annotations including 3D geometry, semantic labels, and instance-level segmentations. It is used for evaluating 3D geometry reconstruction, semantic segmentation, and instance segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: ScanNetV2
